page.title: 07LEISURE TIME
page.content: ALEX Age 11- on a Wednesday and a Sunday I play{Rugby}at Newton-le- Willows Sports Club. Wednesday is {training}night when we are made to work very hard. During the season we play{matches}on a Sunday and are usually very successful. We have lots of{fund raising activities}to help pay for our kit and the minibus which takes us to away matches. My sister Joanne also likes sport. Every week she travels to Warrington to a{ {Gymnastics Club.}She has entered a lot of{competitions}and has won quite a few trophies. DAWN and TRACY- Our{Guide Company} meets at the{Church Hall}on Monday evenings. We do lots of different activities to help us pass various {badges. }It's not all work though, for sometimes we go out and play games or go on{parades.
